title: New: Fickle Friends – Swim
body:
Brighton has a pretty exciting music scene blossoming right now, with the likes of IYES, Phoria and Kanzi putting the south coast on the map.

Self-described ’80’s new wave pop’ quintent **Fickle Friends** impress on their ‘debut’ single, _Swim_, a real no frills pop number, marking them out as an early name to keep on ear out for in 2014.
